marketing_tts_modal/title: Auto generated high quality audio for your flashcards
marketing_tts_modal/description: When you add cards to your deck, we will automatically generate high-quality audio for you. This way, you can listen to them in a clear and easy way. No need to import manualluy audio anymore!
marketing_ai_explainer_modal/title: AI will help you understand the card
marketing_ai_explainer_modal/description: If a flashcard is too difficult to understand, donâ€™t worry! You can tap the helper button to call on Tinycardo's AI assistant. It'll will explain the card to you in a clear and simple way â€” so you can keep learning with confidence!
